result.reason: Host status currently ignores the connection-specific port and depends on ICMP ping, so checking the configured port will make status detection more accurate in common blocked-ping environments.
result.approach: Pass ConnectionInfo into CheckHostAlive and perform a short-timeout TCP probe against info.Hostname:info.Port instead of ping, then add coverage for port-aware host status behavior.
